# GTKX

> React framework for building native GTK4 desktop applications on Linux. Uses a custom React reconciler to render real GTK widgets through a Rust FFI bridge — not a webview.

GTKX lets React developers build Linux desktop apps using familiar patterns (hooks, JSX, component composition) while targeting native GTK4 widgets. Apps integrate properly with the Linux desktop and support Libadwaita for modern GNOME styling.

## Packages

- `@gtkx/react`: Core framework with React reconciler, GTK/Adw components, and render()
- `@gtkx/ffi`: TypeScript FFI bindings to native module, GTK type definitions and enums
- `@gtkx/css`: CSS-in-JS styling system (Emotion-like API for GTK CSS)
- `@gtkx/testing`: Component testing utilities (Testing Library-style API)
- `@gtkx/cli`: CLI for project scaffolding and dev server with HMR

- [Getting Started](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/getting-started): Create your first app, project structure, basic concepts
- [CLI Reference](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/cli): gtkx create, gtkx dev, npm scripts, programmatic API
- [Slots](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/slots): Named child positions for widgets like GtkHeaderBar, GtkPaned, GtkMenuButton
- [Styling](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/styling): css(), cx(), injectGlobal(), GTK CSS syntax, Adwaita classes
- [Lists](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/lists): ListView, GridView, ColumnView, TreeListView, DropDown, ListBox, FlowBox
- [Menus](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/menus): Menu.Item, Menu.Section, Menu.Submenu, keyboard shortcuts, menu bars
- [Adwaita](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/adwaita): Libadwaita components — AdwHeaderBar, AdwActionRow, AdwNavigationView, etc.
- [Portals and Dialogs](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/portals): createPortal(), AlertDialog, AboutDialog, FileDialog, popovers
- [Async Operations](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/async-operations): Async event handlers, loading states, file I/O, network requests, cancellation
- [Error Handling](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/error-handling): Try/catch patterns, error states, toast notifications, validation
- [Testing](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/testing): render(), screen queries, userEvent, waitFor, cleanup
- [Deploying](https://eugeniodepalo.github.io/gtkx/deploying): Single Executable Application (SEA), Flatpak packaging
